extendedInfo.description: Cincinnati Bengals coverage from The Cincinnati Enquirer has never been better. Here we have all the latest news, headlines, opinions, blog posts, photos, videos, tweets, scores, stats and rosters for the Cincinnati Bengals â all in one place, brought to you by the authoritative source of local Bengals coverage, The Cincinnati Enquirer.With stories, photos, videos and opinion by Bengals beat writer Joe Reedy, Paul Daugherty, John Erardi, local bloggers and more than eight professional photographers and videographers, the Cincinnati.Com Football Report App is your one-stop shop for all press coverage of the Bengals.This app offers the latest Bengals-related content from the Cincinnati.Com Network, home of 63 local and national brands including The Enquirer, 26 weekly newspapers and three local magazines. If you have questions, suggestions or requests, feel free to contact us at mobile [at] cincinnati [dot] com and/or to visit us at Cincinnati.Com.

reviews.title: Update !!!!!!
reviews.comment: The standings are 3 weeks behind it needs to be updated and there\'s no settings button! Wtf how are us Bengals fans supposed to stay up to date if its 3 weeks behind? Fix to get 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Will NOT use Facebook to comment
reviews.comment: I have told Enquirer management, but they seem to prefer to lose a subscriber rather than allow Comments without a Facebook account. Same goes for this app.
reviews.author: C Gehr
